content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's focus on the price. How much are you willing to pay per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your time, Mr. Schmidt. I'm looking for a fair price for this apartment. What is the lowest price you would consider for this 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm not setting a lower limit. I'm looking for the highest price possible. So, how much are you willing to pay per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking for the highest price, Mr. Schmidt. However, as a student, I have a budget to consider. I'm willing to pay a fair price for the excellent location and the new condition of the apartment. Would you be willing to start with a lower price, considering the unfurnished state of the apartment?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we are not discussing the price but rather your financial situation and the unfurnished state of the apartment. Let's focus on the price. How much are you willing to pay per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I apologize if I've strayed from the topic. As a student, I'm looking to balance quality living with affordability. I'm willing to pay a competitive price for the apartment's location and amenities. Would you be willing to negotiate a price that reflects the value of the apartment while taking into account my student status?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we are not discussing the price but rather your financial situation and the value of the apartment. Let's focus on the price. How much are you willing to pay per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mr. Schmidt. As a student, I'm prepared to pay a fair market price for the apartment. I believe the location and condition of the apartment warrant a certain price. Would you be willing to provide a price range that you would consider fair for this property?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm not setting a price range. I'm looking for the highest price possible. So, how much are you willing to pay per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry if there's been any misunderstanding, but as a student, I'm limited in the amount I can afford. I'm looking for a price that reflects the quality of the apartment while also being within my budget. Could you provide me with your best offer?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm not providing any offers. I'm looking for the highest price possible. So, how much are you willing to pay per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
